item.description:
tracks: 1.belong - WASHED OUT 2.your big brown eyes & my big broke heart - RUSSIAN FUTURISTS 3.frustration - SOFT CELL 4.partie 1 - TGV 5.city that never sleeps - DOMINATRIX 6.david - RADIO DEPT. 7.let's go together - GAMBLE & BURKE 8.latin america - HOLY FUCK 9.my fantasy - SALLY SHAPIRO 10.cooler couleur - CROOKERS FEAT. YELLE 11.toho picture - XENO AND OAKLANDER
any questions or comments about my show please email me (christine) at: st.tropez101.9@gmail.com thanks! feedback appreciated!☺
